ygData.subject: Re: Question about bard armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Even so, we are talking hill giants and griffons here.  They are starting to be hunted more and more on Innoruuk, but I always get some HGs on track in
ygData.messageBody:
>For example, we need lambent stones for each of the armor
>pieces. Will other classes also need lambent stones for
>their armor quests or are the components they need completely
>different than ours?

Even so, we are talking hill giants and griffons here. They
are starting to be hunted more and more on Innoruuk, but I always
get some HGs on track in Rathe Mountains, and I always seem to
stubmle onto a griffon in North Karana. Your tracking is many
times better than a druid, thus you should be able to find things
before they do. As for wizards killstealing... for lament stones?
You will find nothing different in hunting these monsters, for
sure. There are plenty to go around for any quest.

Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
